briefTitle: Evaluating Mechanical Properties of Post-Mastectomy Skin Flaps to Estimate Reconstruction Risks, the EMPOWER Study
officialTitle: EMPOwER: Evaluating Mechanical Properties of Post-Mastectomy Skin Flaps to Estimate Reconstruction Risks
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Nanomechanical properties of the skin and adjacent soft tissue
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* \* Age 18 and older

  * Female sex
  * Patient with history of mastectomy with tissue expander placement
  * Tissue expander in place at time of study enrollment
  * Patient plans to undergo surgery to exchange tissue expander for permanent breast implant within the next 3 months of signing the informed consent
  * Ability to understand and provide written informed consent in accordance with institutional policies
